alert.note: Alert for Coke; Nolan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 3:53PM CDT until August 17 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Coke County in west central Texas... Southern Nolan County in west central Texas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 352 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Maryneal, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Maryneal around 355 PM CDT. Blackwell around 400 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include The Intersection Of Highway 70 And Ranch Road 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
